casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. STAATS
v.
GIAVASIS 2019-0290 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 22, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Relator's motion to strike motion to dismiss denied. Relator's motion to dismiss denied. Relator's motion to amend and supplement motion to dismiss denied. Respondent's motion to find relator a vexatious litigator pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03(B) granted. O'Connor, C.J., and French, Fischer, and Donnelly, JJ., concur. Kennedy, DeWine, and Stewart, JJ., concur in part and dissent in part and would deny respondent's motion to find relator a vexatious litigator.
